statements: SELECT * FROM VIP_Ticket_Sales ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_price FROM VIP_Ticket_Sales WHERE ticket_price > 100;
SELECT special_perks FROM VIP_Ticket_Sales WHERE customer_name LIKE 'Jo%';
SELECT ticket_id, purchase_date FROM VIP_Ticket_Sales WHERE ticket_price < 50 ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT * FROM VIP_Ticket_Sales WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, ticket_price, purchase_date, special_perks FROM VIP_Ticket_Sales WHERE ticket_price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(ticket_price) AS total_payment FROM VIP_Ticket_Sales GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(ticket_id) > 1;
SELECT customer_name, special_perks FROM VIP_Ticket_Sales WHERE special_perks IS NOT NULL AND special_perks <> '' ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(ticket_id) AS ticket_count FROM VIP_Ticket_Sales WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY ticket_count DESC;
SELECT AVG(ticket_price) AS avg_ticket_price, MIN(ticket_price) AS min_ticket_price, MAX(ticket_price) AS max_ticket_price FROM VIP_Ticket_Sales;
SELECT * FROM vip_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, price FROM vip_tickets WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT ticket_type, price FROM vip_tickets ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, purchase_date FROM vip_tickets WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT tp.ticket_type, vp.perk_name FROM vip_tickets tp JOIN vip_perks vp ON tp.ticket_id = vp.perk_id;
SELECT * FROM vip_tickets WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, ticket_id ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, purchase_date FROM vip_tickets WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_tickets FROM vip_tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_tickets > 3;
SELECT t.ticket_id, tp.perk_name FROM vip_tickets AS t JOIN vip_perks AS tp ON t.ticket_type = tp.perk_name;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM vip_tickets;
SELECT * FROM vip_tickets;
SELECT ticket_type, price FROM vip_tickets WHERE price > 100;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM vip_attendees WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT perk_name, description FROM vip_perks WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT id, purchase_date FROM vip_tickets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vip_tickets WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, ticket_type, price FROM vip_tickets WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT vt.id, va.attendee_name, vp.perk_name FROM vip_tickets vt JOIN vip_attendees va ON vt.id = va.ticket_id JOIN vip_perks vp ON vp.id = vt.id ORDER BY va.attendee_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets_sold, SUM(price) AS total_revenue FROM vip_tickets WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT va.attendee_name, vp.perk_name, vp.expiration_date FROM vip_attendees va LEFT JOIN vip_perks vp ON va.perks = vp.perk_name ORDER BY vp.expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VIP_Tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type FROM Events WHERE total_tickets_available > 0;
SELECT event_name, venue_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name FROM VIP_Tickets WHERE perks = TRUE;
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name, ticket_id, event_id, special_perks FROM VIP_Attendees WHERE special_perks IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM VIP_Tickets WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT event_name, venue_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, ticket_type, purchase_date FROM VIP_Attendees JOIN VIP_Tickets ON VIP_Attendees.ticket_id = VIP_Tickets.ticket_id WHERE VIP_Tickets.perks = TRUE;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name, special_perks FROM Events JOIN VIP_Attendees ON Events.event_id = VIP_Attendees.event_id WHERE Events.total_tickets_available > 0;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, purchase_date, customer_name, perks FROM VIP_Tickets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM vip_attendees ORDER BY attendee_id DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name, ticket_type FROM vip_attendees WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP' ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM vip_tickets WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location FROM festival_events WHERE event_date <= CURDATE();
SELECT attendee_name, purchase_date FROM vip_attendees WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT attendee_name, ticket_type FROM vip_attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, purchase_date FROM vip_attendees WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM festival_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT perk_name, description, perk_value FROM special_perks WHERE perk_value > 100 ORDER BY perk_value ASC;

SELECT ticket_id, event_date, seat_number FROM vip_tickets JOIN festival_events ON vip_tickets.event_date = festival_events.event_date WHERE vip_tickets.ticket_price > 500 ORDER BY event_date ASC, seat_number ASC;
